sentences.en: As discussed in Chapter 10, inconsiderate products ask lots of annoying questions.
sentences.cn: 正如我们在第10章中讨论的, 不体贴的软件总是问许多烦人的问题.

sentences.en: Being inconsiderate to the doctor will get you off on the wrong footing.
sentences.cn: 不替医生着想一点的话,你一开头就讨不了好.

sentences.en: Everyone glared around angrily to see who was being so inconsiderate.
sentences.cn: 大家几乎都怒目的往外看,看谁这么不得人心,把门推开.

sentences.en: He wasn't just inconsiderate, he was downright rude.
sentences.cn: 他岂止不体谅人, 简直是十分粗暴.
不为别人着想的驾车者

sentences.en: Inconsiderate neighbours can be more than an annoyance.
sentences.cn: 不为他人着想的邻居会非常惹人厌。

sentences.en: It is inconsiderate of you to disturb our pleasure.
sentences.cn: 我们高兴时你来打扰,实在是不体谅别人.

sentences.en: It is inconsiderate of you to make so much noise when people are asleep.
sentences.cn: 你太不顾及别人了,人家睡着了你弄得这么响.

sentences.en: It was inconsiderate of him to forget.
sentences.cn: 他不顾别人,把事情忘了.

sentences.en: It was inconsiderate of you not to call.
sentences.cn: 你连个电话也不打，不够体谅人。

sentences.en: It's a bit inconsiderate of her not to let you know when she expects to arrive.
sentences.cn: 她不让你知道她什么时候会到，这样做有些不体谅人。

sentences.en: Motorists were criticised for being inconsiderate to pedestrians.
sentences.cn: 开车的人因不考虑行人而受到指责。

sentences.en: Sometimes making fun of others is inconsiderate and even cruel.
sentences.cn: 有时候取笑别人是不体谅甚至是很残忍的事.

sentences.en: There was something about this which struck Carrie as slightly inconsiderate.
sentences.cn: 这话在嘉莉听来,有点轻率不体谅人.

sentences.en: Why quibble ? It just amounted to pulling an inconsiderate monkey.
sentences.cn: 算了吧,直当是拉着个不通人情的猴子吧.

sentences.en: You have been as miserable and inconsiderate as you can be.
sentences.cn: 是你让人难受,一点不体恤人.

words.tran_cn: 不替别人考虑地；考虑不周地；轻率地
不顾及他人；考虑不周；粗心

trans.tran_cn: 不替别人着想的，不体谅别人的，轻率的，考虑不周的
trans.tran_en: If you accuse someone of being inconsiderate, you mean that they do not take enough care over how their words or actions will affect other people
